document_data.mainbody:
Wynneth was a Reghedmen human and the wife of King Jarund Elkhardt from the Tribe of the Elk in the late 15 century DR.
After the death of her son, Jarund Twice-Born, almost a decade before Icewind Dale Rime of the Frostmaiden takes place in the winter of 1489 DR or later. According to the writers, the date is unimportant, so the adventure can technically take place later., she and King Jarund Elkhardt have not succeeded in conceiving a new child resulting in deliberations about the tribes future leadership.
